about_the_game:
Follow the story of Julie, a charming young workaholic who is always trying her best to make others happy. Her search to understand herself better ends up placing her on a dark path, beyond anything she could have expected. But why is she starting to feel this is where she truly belongs? Is she losing her mind or finding her own twisted version of happiness?

Suffer to Please is an adult narrative-driven visual novel that follows the heroine as she is dragged into a world of sexual slavery, where she's trained that her body is a toy for others to use and any act of hesitation or disobedience is swiftly punished.

The game features:

  • ~25k words of story (~2 hours)
  • ~100 images, most of them definitely NSFW
  • lots of kinky scenes, focused on submission, pain and humiliation
  • detailed focus on the heroine's experience
  • ruthless villains who know what they're doing
  • 2 alternative endings to the story

content_descriptors.notes: This is a game about the heroine falling into slavery. Expect a lot of nudity, bondage, humiliation and punishments to be present. DO NOT enter this game expecting to just see some sex and spankings, it's much more hardcore.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version: 10.10+
  • Processor: CPU: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon via Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: Suffer to Please

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
